document.full_text: at least 35 people were wounded, including seven policemen, in clashes between protesters and security forces in iraq's northern city of sulaimaniya sunday, police and hospital sources said.
document.title: protesters and police clash in northern iraq, 35 wounded
lines_and_colors: at least 35 people were wounded, including seven policemen, in clashes between protesters and security forces in iraq's northern city of sulaimaniya sunday, police and hospital sources said.
